sentences.en: After the adverts, the presenter tried to pretend that everything was back to normal.
sentences.cn: 广告过后，主持人努力假装一切恢复正常。

sentences.en: Finally, who is presenter would play an important role as well.
sentences.cn: 最后, 推荐人也是非常重要的.

sentences.en: I don't want to be pigeonholed as a kids' presenter.
sentences.cn: 我不想被归类为儿童节目主持人。

sentences.en: In her new film, Victoria plays a prima donna television presenter.
sentences.cn: 维多利亚在她的新片里扮演一位妄自尊大的电视节目主持人.

sentences.en: Most people think being a television presenter is exciting.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为当电视节目主持人是一件刺激的事情。

sentences.en: Presenter mea a beneficiary, bank or other party that makes a presentation.
sentences.cn: 提示人意指做出提示的受益人 、 银行或其他一方.

sentences.en: Presenter means a beneficiary, bank or other party that makes a presentation.
sentences.cn: 交单人意指提示单据的受益人 、 银行或其他一方.

sentences.en: Presenter: Jamaica is the right answer!
sentences.cn: 推荐者: 正确答案是牙买加!

sentences.en: She is going on the air as presenter of a new show.
sentences.cn: 她即将上电视主持一档新节目。

sentences.en: Spencer Keith is a local radio presenter and Beatles historian.
sentences.cn: 斯宾瑟基斯是位当地电台主持人,和研究披头四合唱团的历史学家.

sentences.en: That makes her the first TV presenter to work the full term of her pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 那样，她就成了首个怀孕期间一直上班的电视节目主持人。
英国广播公司第二台《新闻之夜》的主播

sentences.en: The programme dispensed with its most popular presenter.
sentences.cn: 这个节目最受欢迎的主持人被换掉了.

sentences.en: The TV presenter announced the grave news.
sentences.cn: 电视解说员宣布了这条重大消息.

sentences.en: This candidate's presenter is an august professor.
sentences.cn: 这个候选人的推荐人是位德高望重的教授.

sentences.en: TV presenter: Dogs are very useful in the community.
sentences.cn: 电视推荐者: 狗在社区里非常有用.

words.tran_cn: 表象的；演出的；上演的；直觉的
存在；出席；参加；风度；仪态
提出者；推荐者；赠送者；任命者

trans.tran_cn: 节目主持人，演播员，推荐者，提出者，赠送者
trans.tran_en: someone who introduces the different parts of a television or radio show
